section.title: Property
section.para: The property handler listens on the properties attribute just like apache ant, consider the following application.ini example:
section.programlisting:
[production]
properties.applicationUrl = APPLICATION_URL properties.baseUrl = "#{applicationUrl}MyProject/public" properties.imagesUrl = #{baseUrl}/images properties.scriptsUrl = #{baseUrl}/scripts properties.locale = en
images.thumbsUp = #{imagesUrl}/thumbsUp.png
section.para: Every occurences will get replaced with their proper properties.
